heading: HR01076
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE RECENT DIPLOMATIC CRISIS IN QATAR WHICH COULD THREATEN THE SECURITY AND WELL-BEING OF OVERSEAS FILIPINOS IN ORDER TO PROPOSE APPROPRIATE POLICY RECOMMENDATIONS AS WELL AS TO URGE THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS (DFA) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT (DOLE) TO COME UP WITH CONTINGENCY MEASURES ON BEHALF OF THE AFFECTED OVERSEAS FILIPINOS AND THEIR FAMILIES
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2017-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01076
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE RECENT DIPLOMATIC CRISIS IN QATAR WHICH COULD THREATEN THE SECURITY AND WELL-BEING OF OVERSEAS FILIPINOS IN ORDER TO PROPOSE APPROPRIATE POLICY RECOMMENDATIONS AS WELL AS TO URGE THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS (DFA) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT (DOLE) TO COME UP WITH CONTINGENCY MEASURES ON BEHALF OF THE AFFECTED OVERSEAS FILIPINOS AND THEIR FAMILIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-06-13
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2017-08-01
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-07-25;
